revised_title: The Restoration of Speech Through a Frightening Dream
tldr: A man named Henry Axford lost his ability to speak after a cold, and despite medical advice, he remained speechless for four years. One day, after getting drunk and having a frightening dream about being in a boiling wort furnace, he woke up and found he could speak again. This case study explores the unusual recovery of speech and the possible psychological factors involved.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Neurology and Speech Therapy
